title: Bobby’s Hemorrhoid Flares Up + Bobby Sets The Record Straight On Katy Perry Twitter Feud
itunes:title: Bobby’s Hemorrhoid Flares Up + Bobby Sets The Record Straight On Katy Perry Twitter Feud
description:
Bobby talks about dealing with some hemorrhoid issues, and sets the record straight on his alleged Twitter feud with Katy Perry. Also, Amy’s son thinks she needs to ‘chill out.’

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
